data.title: Royal Jewels of the World Message Board: Re: Found : Princess Astrid, the bride's Sister and Prince Leopold of the Belgians

data.text:
Thank you for sharing it with us here. This was of course before the time of frequent commercial flights world wide so it must have been difficult for them to make it back to Oslo in time for the wedding.

Previous Message

A kind member of the Royal Forums wrote me that Prince Leopold and Princess Astrid were in east Asia from December 1928 to May 1929.

Previous Message

Did not attend , the whole family did.I don't know why , she was not pregnant at that time.

Previous Message

Thank you so much, Kongetro! ðŸ™‚ðŸ˜Š

Previous Message

This is a group photo taken at the Royal Palace in Oslo in connection with the wedding of Crown Prince Olav and Princess MÃ¤rtha, so the year is 1929. It is showing the guests attending the wedding, though sadly not in their gala attire. (I would love to see that kind of photo, but to my knowledge if there is one it has not yet been published anywhere). There is no mention of the bride's sister Astrid attending the wedding, nor her husband Leopold.

Sitting from left to right: Princess Thyra of Denmark, Princess Ingeborg of Sweden (bride's mother), the bride and groom, Queen Maud of Norway, Crown Princess Louise of Sweden and the Duchess of York

Standing from left to right: Count Carl Bernadotte, Crown Prince Gustav Adolph of Sweden, Prince Carl jr of Sweden (brother to the bride), the Duke of York, Countess Folke Bernadotte, Prince Valdemar of Denmark, Princess Ingrid of Sweden, Prince George of Greece, King Haakon VII of Norway, Count Folke Bernadotte, Princess Margaretha of Denmark (born Princess of Sweden and sister to the bride), Prince Gustav of Denmark, Prince Carl of Sweden, Countess Carl Bernadotte, Prince Axel of Denmark and Prince Eugene of Sweden.

Sitting on the floor in the front: Prince George and Prince Flemming.

Previous Message

That's a good picture. But would you mind to identify who these people were in the picture? I recognized a few people: The Duke and Duchess of York (later King George VI and Queen Elizabeth), Prince Olav of Norway and Princess Martha of Sweden, Princess Ingrid of Sweden (Queen of Denmark), Queen Maud of Norway, and the tall gentleman on the left side as seen by me could be Crown Prince of Sweden (Ingrid's father and later King of Sweden). But that was about it. Could anyone identify each person in each row? Thank you in advance! (and what year and where was it taken?)

Previous Message

They were not in the group photo of the Royal wedding guests:

Previous Message

Could someone have in his files a Group Picture of the Royals at the Wedding ? I wanted to see my Prince Leopold and Princess Astrid attending in 1929.
